solution_line_template: That means he makes a profit of {selling_price_per_computer}-{parts_cost_per_computer}=$<<{selling_price_per_computer}-{parts_cost_per_computer}={profit_per_computer}>>{profit_per_computer} per computer
So he makes {profit_per_computer}*{computers_per_month}=$<<{profit_per_computer}*{computers_per_month}={total_profit_from_sales}>>{total_profit_from_sales} from selling computers
He has extra expenses of {rent_expense}+{other_expenses}=$<<{rent_expense}+{other_expenses}={total_monthly_expenses}>>{total_monthly_expenses} a month
